name: Drill44
description: In Drill44, the scarcity of minerals in the world has made industrial mining a very lucrative business, so your role is that of a miner who has started in this business, your mission is to obtain the minerals found in the underground to later sell them and buy improvements for your machine in the workshop. But it will not be an easy task, you will have to deal with extremely dangerous mines, however, it is worth the risk.
